me_no_target: You look for someone to accept an apology from, but resort to feeling sorry for yourself instead.
me_self: You accept your own apology.  Strange, you never remembered doing anything wrong??
me_room: You accept the profferred apology graciously.
actor_self: $n rather reluctantly accepts his own apology.
actor_me: $n graciously accepts your apology.  Did you even offer it??
